    • Method Detail

      • setStrategy

        public void setStrategy(MazeFactoryStrategyName name)
        class that changes the strategy to be used during maze creation
        Parameters:
        name - : the name of the strategy to use. The name is an enum of type MazeFactoryStrategyName

      • getStrategyName

        public MazeFactoryStrategyName getStrategyName()
        getter for the strategy name
        Returns:
        MazeFactoryStrategyName : the name of the current strategy

      • generateMaze

        public Maze generateMaze(java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.Integer length,
                         java.lang.Integer width,
                         Person creator)
        main method to generate mazes
        Parameters:
        name - : the name of the maze that will be created
        length - : the length (or height) in number of cells of the maze that will be created
        width - : the width in number of cells of the maze that will be created
        creator - : the Person object corresponding to the creator of the maze. It is the current user of the application
        Returns:
        Maze : the maze generated

      • generateMazeWithStartEnd

        public Maze generateMazeWithStartEnd(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.Integer length,
                                     java.lang.Integer width,
                                     int startX,
                                     int startY,
                                     int endX,
                                     int endY,
                                     Person creator)
        secondary method to generate mazes. It allows to specify a start and end point
        Parameters:
        name - : the name of the maze that will be created
        length - : the length (or height) in number of cells of the maze that will be created
        width - : the width in number of cells of the maze that will be created
        creator - : the Person object corresponding to the creator of the maze. It is the current user of the application
        startX - : the x coordinate of the start point
        startY - : the y coordinate of the start point
        endX - : the x coordinate of the end point
        endY - : the y coordinate of the end point
        Returns:
        Maze : the maze generated
